segments.text: Hello . Did you enjoy the tour of our new premises ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did indeed . But , could you tell me what exactly the ' Priority Service Room ' is used for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . As we provide many different services for all of our valued customers , we like to give than a special place to do their business with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think of myself as a valued customer . What services can you offer me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are all kinds of deposit services and also the calculations of the interest . It's specific to different accounts and different circumstances .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Is there anything else that can be done there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's information on deposit or loan rates , exchange rates ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The list goes on and on !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it sure does . And with our new premises , we have new services . We can provide 24 - hour support for your Wealth Management .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , I can talk to my Personal Banker 24/7 . That's really thoughtful of you . And I have to say , I love the new look of the bank .
segments.speaker: S2
